lines.text: Hide a stone among stones and a man among men.
What you make of another's kindness is up to you.
[subtitled version]
If we want to get rid of him, now's our chance.
Shhh.
[He points at Princess Yuki sitting right behind them]
Don't worry. She's mute.
She's mute but she can hear.
Stupid. A mute can't speak because they're deaf.
[first lines]
Get away from me! You stink of dead bodies!
Give it up. We both stink of dead bodies. And it's all your fault!
[last lines]

[Tahei hands Matakishi a piece of gold]
You take this.
No, you keep it.
But...
Don't worry about it.
[they both laugh]

[the two men rest against a wall of dirt from digging in the hidden fortress, Matashichi's leg over Tahei's. Tahei kicks it away]
What are you doing? Don't touch me, fool! lt's uncomfortable enough.

[Kicks Tahei's leg]
lt's your face that makes me uncomfortable.
Leave my face alone!
[He starts blinking the sweat away profusely]
l hate the way you blink all the time.
[Tahei continues blinking]
There you go again.
Shut up! Put your filthy teeth away!
[He begins prodding at Matashichi with an oar]
Show them to me once more and l'll bash them in!
[Matashichi lunges with a fork, its prongs landing right near Tahei's head. Tahei starts blubbering]
l'm quitting! This is idiotic! l dig and dig and nothing!

[Holding onto Matashichi as the escaping, rioting prisoners run past]
Matashichi, this is hell!
Let's die together.
